ðŸ“– Summary: Packemon is a TUI tool written in Go for generating and monitoring network packets. It allows users to craft and send custom packets to any network interface and simultaneously monitor network traffic, filtering and inspecting packets in detail. The tool supports Windows, macOS, and Linux.
